1000000101100101 0011011101010011 0 -> sum: 1011100010111000, cout: 0
0000000011000101 1011001110000011 0 -> sum: 1011010001001000, cout: 0
0101111111111101 1011101101001000 0 -> sum: 0001101101000101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
